content.rendered: “Take a seat and unwind, visualise yourself sitting somewhere tranquil, while you bring your attention to all the muscles in your body feeling soft and relaxed. With each sip of soothing TranquiliTea, focus on your mind feeing calm and peaceful. Leave any worries of the day behind as you prepare for a deep peaceful sleep which will leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated the next morning.”
